function Image_display(){fetch('http://localhost:3001/Image_Url').then(function(response){return response.blob();})// Get the image data as a Blob
.then(function(blob){var temp=document.getElementById('image1');if(temp!=null){temp.src=URL.createObjectURL(blob);}else{var imgElement=document.createElement('img');imgElement.id='image1';imgElement.src=URL.createObjectURL(blob);imgElement.style.position='absolute';// Set position to absolute
imgElement.style.top='300px';// Set the top position in pixels
imgElement.style.right='50px';// Set the left position in pixels
imgElement.style.width='400px';// Set the width in pixels or other CSS units
imgElement.style.height='400px';// Set the height to 'auto' to maintain aspect ratio
document.body.appendChild(imgElement);}}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});}export default Image_display;
